com.qtplaf.library.swing.core

Class JFormRecordCustomizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.swing.core.JFormRecordCustomizer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormUtils.Customizers.StatisticsFormCustomizer, FormUtils.Customizers.TickersFormCustomizer

    public class JFormRecordCustomizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Customizer of the JFormRecord. Extend and overwrite the necessary methods.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postLayoutConfigure(JFormRecord form)
      Used to make customizations on the form after layed out by the autoLayout feature, normally to add value actions to form controls.
      boolean validateForm(JFormRecord form)
      Validates the form.

      • postLayoutConfigure

        public void postLayoutConfigure(JFormRecord form)
        Used to make customizations on the form after layed out by the autoLayout feature, normally to add value actions to form controls.
        Parameters:
        form - The form to configure.

      • validateForm

        public boolean validateForm(JFormRecord form)
        Validates the form.
        Parameters:
        form - The JFormRecord to validate.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating that the form values are valid.
